A4.text: Taft's unpopularity contributed to major Democratic gains in the 2006 election, including the defeat of Republican Ken Blackwell by Democrat Ted Strickland in the race to replace Taft as governor.

A5.text: Taft's final year in office, his approval hovered in the low-to-mid 20s. Taft's unpopularity contributed to major Democratic gains in the 2006 election
